snippet: Though Wales won't be a pinprick on the World Cup map, no country on earth would refuse Ryan Giggs, Gareth Bale or Aaron Ramsey right now.
lead_paragraph: Though Wales won't be a pinprick on the World Cup map, no country on earth would refuse Ryan Giggs, Gareth Bale or Aaron Ramsey right now.

headline.main: 3 Gifted Welshmen Any Nation Would Love to Have
headline.print_headline: 3 Gifted Welshmen Any Nation Would Love to Have
